name: Cursed Blade

name: Cursed Disciple

name: Cutlass Courier

name: Cutpurse

name: Cutting Class
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavorText: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

name: Cycle of Hatred

flavorText: If you run 2 of these, would that make it the bi-cycle of hatred?

name: DOOM!
text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.

name: Dalaran Aspirant

name: Dalaran Librarian
text: Battlecry: Silence adjacent minions.

name: Dalaran Mage

name: Dancing Swords

name: Daring Escape

name: Daring Reporter

name: Dark Skies

name: Darkbomb

name: Darkglare

text: Give your weapon +2 Attack.

name: Deadly Poison
text: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavorText: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells. Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison? Poison Elemental? Nobody wants that.

name: Deadly Shot
text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

name: Deadly Shot
text: Destroy a random enemy minion.

name: Deck of Chaos

name: Deck of Wonders
text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.

text: Deal damage to a minion and its neighbors. (Improved by number of other spells in your hand.)

name: Deeprun Engineer

name: Defile

name: Demolisher
text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

name: Demolisher

name: Depth Charge

name: Divine Favor

name: Divine Spirit
text: Double a minion's Health.

name: Doomguard

name: Doomhammer

name: Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.

name: Dragged Below

name: Dragon Consort

name: Dragon Egg
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/1 Whelp.

name: Dragon Roar
text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
flavorText: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

name: Dragon Soul
text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
flavorText: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

name: Dragon's Breath
text: Deal 4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavorText: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy? It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.

name: Dragon's Fury
text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
flavorText: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

name: Dragon's Pack
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. If you've Invoked twice, give them +3/+3.

name: Dragonbane
text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

name: Dragonblight Cultist
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond. Gain +1 Attack for each other friendly minion.
flavorText: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

name: Dragoncaster
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavorText: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

name: Dragonfire Potion
text: Deal 5 damage to all minions except Dragons.
flavorText: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

name: Dragonhawk Rider
text: Inspire: Gain Windfury this turn.
flavorText: Check it out. You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".

name: Dragonling Mechanic
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Mechanical Dragonling.
flavorText: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

name: Dragonmaw Overseer
text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavorText: Ah, the Booterang... nothing cures peon laziness faster.

name: Dragonmaw Scorcher
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.

name: Dragonmaw Sky Stalker
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Dragonrider.

name: Dragonrider Talritha

name: Drain Life
text: Deal 2 damage. Restore 2 Health to your hero.

name: Drain Life
text: Deal 2 damage. Restore 2 Health to your hero.

name: Drain Soul

name: Drakkari Defender
text: Taunt Overload: (3)

name: Drakkari Enchanter

name: Drakonid Crusher

name: Drakonid Operative

name: Dread Corsair

name: Dread Infernal
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.

name: Dread Raven

name: Dreaded Mount

name: Dreadlord's Bite

name: Dreadscale
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.

name: Dreaming Drake

name: Dreampetal Florist
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (7).

name: Drek'Thar

name: Druid of the Claw

flavorText: Cat or Bear? Cat or Bear?! I just cannot CHOOSE!

name: Druid of the Fang

name: Druid of the Flame
text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
flavorText: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.

name: Druid of the Reef
text: Choose One - Transform into a 3/1 Shark with Rush; or a 1/3 Turtle with Taunt.
flavorText: “Wow, there’s a whole sunken city down here!”

name: Druid of the Scythe
text: Choose One - Transform into a 4/2 with Rush; or a 2/4 with Taunt.
flavorText: She's a scythe for sore eyes.

name: Drygulch Jailor

flavorText: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

name: Duel!
text: Summon a minion from each player's deck. They fight!
flavorText: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

name: Dun Baldar Bridge

flavorText: At least there's no fall damage in Hearthstone.

name: Dune Sculptor
text: After you cast a spell, add a random Mage minion to your hand.
flavorText: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

name: Dunk Tank

flavorText: "When I said bring a tank to the dungeon, this is not what I had in mind!"

name: Duskbat
text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
flavorText: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

name: Duskboar
flavorText: Often excluded from dinner parties. To be fair, he is very boaring.

name: Duskfallen Aviana
text: On each player's turn, the first card played costs (0).
flavorText: Someone called her "Tweety". She didn't take it well.

name: Dust Devil
text: Windfury. Overload: (2)
flavorText: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

name: Dwarven Archaeologist
text: After you Discover a card, reduce its cost by (1).
flavorText: She's making great progress on paying off that advanced degree.

name: Dwarven Sharpshooter
text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
flavorText: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

name: E.M.P. Operative
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mech.
flavorText: "I said this looks like a job for me So everybody just follow me 'Cause we need a little E.M.P. 'Cause it feels so mechy without me…"

name: EVIL Cable Rat

name: EVIL Genius

name: EVIL Quartermaster

name: EVIL Totem
text: At the end of your turn, add a Lackey to your hand.

name: Eager Underling

name: Earthen Scales

name: Earthen Scales
text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavorText: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

name: Electrowright

name: Elven Archer
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.

name: Elven Archer
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.

name: Emberscale Drake

name: Embiggen
text: Give all minions in your deck +2/+2. They cost (1) more (up to 10).

text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.

name: Execute

name: Fireball

flavorText: This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Fireball
text: Deal 6 damage.
flavorText: This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Fireball
text: Deal 6 damage.
flavorText: This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Fireguard Destroyer
text: Battlecry: Gain 1-4 Attack. Overload: (1)
flavorText: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.

name: Firelands Portal
text: Deal 5 damage. Summon a random 5-Cost minion.
flavorText: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"

name: Firemancer Flurgl
text: After you play a Murloc, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: Diss tracks spitting straight fire.

name: Firework Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Corrupt: Deal 12 instead.
flavorText: The brightest spark can still go dark.

name: First Blade of Wrynn
text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Gain Rush if this has at least 4 Attack.
flavorText: Valedictorian of knight school.

name: First Day of School
text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
flavorText: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

name: First Flame
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Add a Second Flame to your hand.
flavorText: You never forget your first love: fire.

name: Fishy Flyer
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a 4/3 Ghost with Rush to your hand.
flavorText: Like a fish out of water.

name: Fist of Jaraxxus
text: When you play or discard this, deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

name: Fjola Lightbane
text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.
flavorText: LOVES being called "the wonder twins".

name: Flag Runner
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: I see your argument, but…do you have a flag?

name: Flame Geyser
text: Deal 2 damage. Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
flavorText: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

name: Flame Imp
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Imps like being on fire. They just do.

name: Flame Juggler
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better! Because FIRE!"

name: Flame Lance
text: Deal 8 damage to a minion.
flavorText: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

name: Flame Leviathan
text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
flavorText: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

name: Flamecannon
text: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.

name: Flamereaper
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero attacks.
flavorText: Honestly it sows more flame than it reaps.

name: Flamereaper
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero attacks.
flavorText: Honestly it sows more flame than it reaps.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal 5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal 4 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal 5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems. There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems. There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems. There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Flamewaker
text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

name: Flanking Maneuver
text: Summon a 4/2 Demon with Rush. If it dies this turn, summon another.
flavorText: So, do we have advantage? Can I sneak attack?

name: Flanking Strike
text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
flavorText: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

name: Flare
text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
flavorText: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
text: Summon 3 minions from your deck. They attack enemy minions, then die.
flavorText: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

name: Flash Heal
text: Restore 5 Health.
flavorText: Flash! Ahhhhhhh~

name: Flash Heal
text: Restore 5 Health.
flavorText: Flash! Ahhhhhhh~

name: Flash of Light
text: Restore 4 Health. Draw a card.
flavorText: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: Flash of Light
text: Restore 4 Health. Draw a card.
flavorText: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: Flesh Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
flavorText: "A BIG mistake."

name: Flesheating Ghoul
text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name. It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

name: Flesheating Ghoul
text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name. It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

name: Flightmaster Dungar
text: Battlecry: Choose a flightpath and go Dormant. Awaken with a bonus when you complete it!
flavorText: Flight’s a little bumpy, but there’s plenty of legroom.

name: Flipper Friends
text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Orca with Taunt; or six 1/1 Otters with Rush.
flavorText: Despite the harsh conditions, friends can still be found under the sea.

name: Floating Watcher
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

name: Flobbidinous Floop
text: While in your hand, this is a 3/4 copy of the last minion you played.
flavorText: Of all the scientists, he has the most knowledge (when measured in volume).

name: Floecaster
text: Costs (2) less for each Frozen enemy.
flavorText: His real name is Melvin, but he prefers his friends call him ... <sigh> ..."Floecaster."

name: Floop's Glorious Gloop
text: Whenever a minion dies this turn, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavorText: How much gloop could Floop's Gloop gloop if Floop's Gloop could gloop gloop?

name: Florist
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the cost of a Nature spell in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Trade district. Trade district a shop. Color Legendary. Color Legendary golden. Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose.

name: Flying Machine
text: Windfury
flavorText: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a “falling machine.”

name: Foe Reaper 4000
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever it attacks.
flavorText: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

name: Font of Power
text: Discover a Mage minion. If your deck has no minions, keep all 3.
flavorText: It's Comic Sans.

name: Fool's Bane
text: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
flavorText: A fool and his bane are soon parted.

name: Forbidden Flame
text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
flavorText: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

name: Forbidden Healing
text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
flavorText: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

name: Forbidden Ritual
text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
flavorText: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

name: Forbidden Shaping
text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
flavorText: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

name: Forbidden Words
text: Spend all your Mana. Destroy a minion with that much Attack or less.
flavorText: Please confirm your age before reading this flavor text.

name: Force of Nature
text: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
flavorText: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

name: Force of Nature
text: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
flavorText: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

name: Force-Tank MAX
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: There is a factory in Tanaris for crafting force-tanks, but it only ever made two, because of cost overruns.

name: Forest Guide
text: At the end of your turn, both players draw a card.
flavorText: "Just sign this waiver, and we'll be on our way."

name: Forge of Souls
text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
flavorText: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

name: Forged in Flame
text: Destroy your weapon, then draw cards equal to its Attack.
flavorText: Don't worry, your wounds are self-cauterizing!

name: Forgotten Torch
text: Deal 3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
flavorText: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation? It's one of life's many mysteries.

name: Forked Lightning
text: Deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavorText: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

name: Former Champ
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Hotshot.
flavorText: The last time he saw action, Undertaker ruled the meta.

name: Fortune Teller
text: Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each spell in your hand.
flavorText: "I see a giant piano in your future."

name: Foxy Fraud
text: Battlecry: Your next Combo card this turn costs (2) less.
flavorText: His other street con involves a druid. He can't pull it off without a plant.

name: Frazzled Freshman
flavorText: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

name: Free Admission
text: Draw 2 minions. If they're both Demons, reduce their Costs by (2).
flavorText: "Quick, get in before someone sees you, or worse, someone sees me."

name: Freezing Potion
text: Freeze an enemy.
flavorText: This is delicious! Oh no. BRAIN FREEEEEEEZE!

name: Freezing Trap
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavorText: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Frenzied Felwing
text: Costs (1) less for each damage dealt to your opponent this turn.
flavorText: Not to be confused with the "friendsy” felwing.

name: Friendly Bartender
text: At the end of your turn, restore 1 Health to your hero.
flavorText: "What'll it be? A Jade Brew? A Grimy Goose? A Kabal Manatini?"

name: Frigid Snobold
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

name: From the Depths
text: Reduce the Cost of the bottom five cards in your deck by (3), then Dredge.
flavorText: "This is why I'm afraid of the deep end of the pool."

name: Frost Elemental
text: Battlecry: Freeze a character.
flavorText: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

name: Frost Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
flavorText: Don't ask him about the beard. JUST DON'T.

name: Frost Nova
text: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavorText: Hey man, that's cold. Literally and metaphorically.

name: Frost Shock
text: Deal 1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
flavorText: FROST SHOCK!

name: Frostbite
text: Deal 3 damage. Honorable Kill: Your opponent's next spell costs (2) more.
flavorText: The sad reality of a raging toothpaste addiction.

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
flavorText: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Frostweave Dungeoneer
text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Frost spell, summon two 1/1 Elementals that Freeze.
flavorText: It's a woven blanket of ice but surprisingly comforting.

name: Frostwolf Grunt
text: Taunt
flavorText: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that. It's more than just a job.

name: Frostwolf Warlord
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
flavorText: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley. Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

name: Frostwolf Warmaster
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn.
flavorText: “The spoils of war ain’t free… Unless you’re me!”

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Frozen Buckler
text: Gain 10 Armor. At the start of your next turn, lose 5 Armor.
flavorText: "Hey, I bet I could shatter this."

name: Frozen Crusher
text: After this minion attacks, Freeze it.
flavorText: Goes by the online handle "KoolKrusher99."

name: Frozen Mammoth
text: This is Frozen until you cast a Fire spell.
flavorText: *record scratch* "So, you may be wondering how I got here."

name: Full-Blown Evil
text: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Repeatable this turn.
flavorText: This isn’t your average, everyday evil. This is ADVANCED evil.

name: Fungal Fortunes
text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any minions drawn.
flavorText: Far superior to a beanstalk boondoggle.

name: Furbolg Mossbinder
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6 Elemental.
flavorText: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

name: Furious Felfin
text: Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
flavorText: Signature moves include Eye Bream, Feast of Soles, and Metamorphofish.

name: Furious Howl
text: Draw a card. Repeat until you have at least 3 cards.
flavorText: Hunters make the worst neighbors.

name: Fury (Rank 1)
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavorText: Rank 3 is when your mom uses your middle name.

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavorText: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavorText: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavorText: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Gadgetzan Jouster
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

name: Gahz'rilla
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, double its Attack.
flavorText: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

name: Galakrond, the Nightmare
text: Battlecry: Draw 1 card. It costs (0). ( )
flavorText: The enormous creature unfurled terrifying claws dripping with poisonous ichor. King Togwaggle was pleased, but inwardly disappointed the great Nightmare refused to wear the candle.

name: Galakrond, the Unbreakable
text: Battlecry: Draw 1 minion. Give it +4/+4. ( )
flavorText: The ground quaked beneath the behemoth as Dr. Boom continued: "…with over 400 TONS of solid Storm Silver plate." Then he beeped a small remote. "And luxury spikes!"

name: Galakrond, the Wretched
text: Battlecry: Summon 1 random Demon. ( )
flavorText: Fel-flames slowly writhed around the skeleton, until the great bones knit themselves together into a demonic monstrosity. Rafaam shielded his face from the heat but could not hide his grin.

name: Galvanizer
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Mechs in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Also known as a power zinc.

name: Gan'arg Glaivesmith
text: Outcast: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavorText: When isolation becomes motivation.

name: Gang Up
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
flavorText: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.

name: Gankster
text: Stealth After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
flavorText: UGH! IM GETTING MY MAIN!

name: Garrison Commander
text: You can use your Hero Power twice a turn.
flavorText: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.

name: Garrote
text: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero. Shuffle 2 Bleeds into your deck that deal 2 more when drawn.
flavorText: "I don't have money… but what I do have is a particular set of skills."

name: Gazlowe
text: Whenever you cast a 1-Cost spell, add a random Mech to your hand.
flavorText: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
text: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention.
flavorText: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor. He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

name: Gemstudded Golem
text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
flavorText: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

name: Genn Greymane
text: Start of Game: If your deck has only even- Cost cards, your starting Hero Power costs (1).
flavorText: Ever since Sylvanas killed his son, he's dreamed of getting… even.

name: Genzo, the Shark
text: Whenever this attacks, both players draw until they have 3 cards.
flavorText: Infamous in the seedy underground card rooms of Gadgetzan, he got his nickname winning the coveted Shark Plushie in the city's first Hearthstone tournament.

name: Geosculptor Yip
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with Cost equal to your Armor (up to 10).
flavorText: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

name: Getaway Kodo
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.
flavorText: Get to da Kodo! Now!

name: Ghost Light Angler
text: Echo
flavorText: BoOooOogrglgrlgrlooOoOoo!

name: Giant Anaconda
text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your hand with 5 or more Attack.
flavorText: Must be something it ate.

name: Giant Sand Worm
text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavorText: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

name: Gibberling
text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
flavorText: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

name: Gift of the Naaru
text: Restore 3 Health to all characters. If any are still damaged, draw a card.
flavorText: What do I look like, a charity?

name: Gifts of Azshara
text: Draw a card. If you played a Naga while holding this, do it again.
flavorText: Barber: What do you want? Naga: You ever have a thirst for arcane power? Barber: Say no more.

name: Giggling Inventor
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: "I shall build a mighty golden paladin! And he will GREET the WORLD!"

name: Gilded Gargoyle
text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavorText: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

name: Glacial Mysteries
text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavorText: The secret is in the frosting.

name: Glaciate
text: Discover an 8-Cost minion. Summon and Freeze it.
flavorText: We now have a more accurate answer to the age-old question "What's cooler than being cool?"

name: Gladiator's Longbow
text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavorText: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

name: Glaivebound Adept
text: Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, deal 4 damage.
flavorText: "Initiate, this is your glaive. Think of it as an extension of yourself... Did you just throw it?!"

name: Glaivezooka
text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavorText: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

name: Glinda Crowskin
text: Minions in your hand have Echo.
flavorText: Summon an unlimited* number of minions!** *Six **Wisps

name: Gloom Stag
text: Taunt Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Majestic. Ethereal. Still pretty down in the dumps, though.

name: Glory Chaser
text: After you play a Taunt minion, draw a card.
flavorText: When you've reached the peak of competition twice, how hard can winning one valley be?

name: Glowfly Swarm
text: Summon a 2/2 Glowfly for each spell in your hand.
flavorText: Glowflies are distant relations to spelling bees.

name: Glugg the Gulper
text: Colossal +3 After a friendly minion dies, gain its original stats.
flavorText: Food can be scarce in the Abyssal Depths, leading its top predators to pursue any potential source of sustenance. Even extra crunchy ones.

name: Gnash
text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
flavorText: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

name: Gnomeferatu
text: Battlecry: Remove the top card of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: She prefers the term "Glampire."

name: Gnomish Experimenter
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If it's a minion, transform it into a Chicken.
flavorText: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.

name: Gnomish Inventor
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

name: Goblin Blastmage
text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

name: Goblin Prank
text: Give a friendly minion +3/+3 and Rush. It dies at end of turn.
flavorText: "Ha ha! Glork looks ridiculous! ...Glork? Glork?"

name: Goblin Sapper
text: Has +4 Attack while your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand.
flavorText: He’s not such a binge exploder anymore. These days, he only explodes socially.

name: Golakka Crawler
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Pirate and gain +1/+1.
flavorText: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

name: Gold Road Grunt
text: Taunt Frenzy: Gain Armor equal to the damage taken.
flavorText: No, no, no, Gold Roads are very different from Yellow Brick Roads.

name: Goldshire Footman
text: Taunt
flavorText: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

name: Goldshire Gnoll
text: Rush Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavorText: They're searching for one ring. They're pretty sure someone said Goldshire.

name: Gone Fishin'
text: Dredge. Combo: Draw a card.
flavorText: Rogues want me Fish fear me

name: Gonk, the Raptor
text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavorText: There’s a word for Zandalari druids who refuse to pledge loyalty to Gonk: “Delicious.”

name: Gorehowl
text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavorText: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe. Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession. Quite the mystery!

name: Gorehowl
text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavorText: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe. Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession. Quite the mystery!

name: Gorehowl
text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavorText: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe. Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession. Quite the mystery!

name: Gorillabot A-3
text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
flavorText: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.

name: Gormok the Impaler
text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
flavorText: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds. For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

name: Gral, the Shark
text: Battlecry: Eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle: Add it to your hand.
flavorText: “… We’re gonna need a bigger board.”

name: Grand Archivist
text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: Qualifications: Found pointy hat.

name: Grand Empress Shek'zara
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your deck and draw all copies of it.
flavorText: So is a Grand Empress an empress that's grand or an empress's empress?

name: Grand Finale
text: Summon an 8/8 Elemental. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn.
flavorText: Considering all the other hazards at Darkmoon, overindulgent pyrotechnics seem downright pedestrian.

name: Grand Magus Antonidas
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a Fire spell on each of your last three turns, cast 3 Fireballs at random enemies. ( /3)
flavorText: He's really disappointed Jaina became a frost mage.

name: Grand Totem Eys'or
text: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all other Totems in your hand, deck and battlefield.
flavorText: Some say it can see straight into the soul of any who dare to read its flavor text...

name: Granite Forgeborn
text: Battlecry: Reduce the cost of Elementals in your hand and deck by (1).
flavorText: If he stops being useful, just turn him into a kitchen countertop.

name: Grave Horror

text: On your turn, your hero has +2 Attack and Windfury.
flavorText: A fan favorite, Inara is always met with thunderous applause.

name: Incanter's Flow
text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by (1).
flavorText: "Gettin' them discounts in bulk amounts, spells can come, and spells can go, castin' costs drop with my sweet, sweet flow."

name: Infectious Sporeling
text: After this damages a minion, turn it into an Infectious Sporeling.
flavorText: "The best thing about being me—there’s so many 'me's."

name: Infested Goblin
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Scarabs with Taunt to your hand.
flavorText: Trust us. DON'T go cheap on the scarab repellent.

name: Infested Wolf
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.
flavorText: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

name: Ini Stormcoil
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Mech. Summon a copy of it with Rush, Windfury, and Divine Shield.
flavorText: Before setting her sights on exploration, Ini was known for many inventions, such as the airborne breadmaking dirigible, the hypersprocket 200X zoom binoculars, and jobes (jean robes).

name: Initiation
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
flavorText: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

name: Injured Blademaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
flavorText: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

name: Injured Marauder
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavorText: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.

name: Injured Tol'vir
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavorText: Me-OW!

name: Inner Demon
text: Give your hero +8 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Critical component of any tragic backstory.

name: Inner Fire
text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavorText: Good idea: Buffing your minions. Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Inner Fire
text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavorText: Good idea: Buffing your minions. Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Inner Rage
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Inner Rage
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavorText: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.
flavorText: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavorText: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Insight
text: Draw a minion. Corrupt: Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavorText: Shouldn't the eyes be facing backwards for insight?

name: Into the Fray
text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: "You are in my FRAY!"

name: Investment Opportunity
text: Draw an Overload card.
flavorText: "It's a real fixer-upper. I mean a REAL fixer upper."

name: Invigorating Sermon
text: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavorText: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

name: Irebound Brute
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each card drawn this turn.
flavorText: "You don't understand… ogres are an untapped market for vengeance and hatred!"

name: Iron Hide
text: Gain 5 Armor.
flavorText: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

name: Iron Sensei
text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavorText: Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language. 0110100001101001

name: Ironbark Protector
text: Taunt
flavorText: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

name: Ironbeak Owl
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Ironbeak Owl
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Irondeep Trogg
text: After your opponent casts a spell, summon another Irondeep Trogg.
flavorText: STOP AGGROING MORE!

name: Ironforge Portal
text: Gain 4 Armor. Summon a random 4-Cost minion.
flavorText: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!

name: Ironforge Rifleman
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

name: Ironfur Grizzly
text: Taunt
flavorText: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

name: Ironwood Golem
text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
flavorText: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

name: Ivus, the Forest Lord
text: Battlecry: Spend the rest of your Mana and gain +2/+2, Rush, Divine Shield, or Taunt at random for each.
flavorText: He's always welcome at the local tavern, unlike a certain Ancient.

name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

name: Jade Behemoth
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavorText: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

name: Jade Blossom
text: Summon a Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavorText: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.

name: Jade Claws
text: Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Overload: (1)
flavorText: "Best manicure ever!" - Aya Blackpaw

name: Jade Idol
text: Choose One - Summon a Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.
flavorText: Shuffle or no guts.

name: Jade Lightning
text: Deal 4 damage. Summon a Jade Golem.
flavorText: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

name: Jade Spirit
text: Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavorText: "He's so cute! I just want to squeeze him, then use him for Jade Golem parts!" - Aya Blackpaw

name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
text: Battlecry: If your Hero Power dealt 8 damage this game, summon Ragnaros the Firelord. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

name: Jar Dealer
text: Deathrattle: Add a random 1-Cost minion to your hand.
flavorText: What's in the jar? It could be anyone!

name: Jeeves
text: At the end of each player's turn, that player draws until they have 3 cards.
flavorText: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.

name: Jerry Rig Carpenter
text: Battlecry: Draw a Choose One spell and split it.
flavorText: Choose Two – Good; Cheap; or Fast.

name: Jeweled Macaw
text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
flavorText: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
text: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health. Overload: (1)
flavorText: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

name: Judgment of Justice
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, set its Attack and Health to 1.
flavorText: Look, we don't need a jury. We've got a paladin right here!

name: Juicy Psychmelon
text: Draw a 7, 8, 9, and 10-Cost minion from your deck.
flavorText: It's not juicy at all. IT'S JUST MESSING WITH YOUR HEAD.

name: Jumbo Imp
text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavorText: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

name: Jungle Moonkin
text: Both players have Spell Damage +2.
flavorText: The REAL angry chicken!

name: Jungle Panther
text: Stealth
flavorText: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

name: Junkbot
text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

name: K'thir Ritualist
text: Taunt Battlecry: Add a random 4-Cost minion to your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Something evil this way comes… and it's bringing friends over!

name: Kabal Courier
text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage, Priest, or Warlock card.
flavorText: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

name: Kabal Lackey
text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
flavorText: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

name: Kabal Songstealer
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

name: Kabal Trafficker
text: At the end of your turn, add a random Demon to your hand.
flavorText: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
text: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
flavorText: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Kangor's Endless Army
text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
flavorText: "That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless." - Countess Ashmore

name: Kara Kazham!
text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
flavorText: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.

name: Kargath Bladefist
text: Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

name: Kayn Sunfury
text: Charge All friendly attacks ignore Taunt.
flavorText: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

name: Kazakus, Golem Shaper
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, build a custom Golem.
flavorText: With a little love and some tenderness, we’ll CRUSH OUR FOES!

name: Keen Reflex
text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. Honorable Kill: Gain +1 Attack this turn.
flavorText: All of Onyxia's whelps were no match for Kurtrus' backflip.

name: Keening Banshee
text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

name: Keeper Stalladris
text: After you cast a Choose One spell, add copies of both choices to your hand.
flavorText: Keeps your choices handy.

name: Keeper of the Grove
text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
flavorText: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

name: Kel'Thuzad
text: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavorText: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.

name: Keymaster Alabaster
text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, add a copy to your hand that costs (1).
flavorText: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

name: Kezan Mystic
text: Battlecry: Take control of a random enemy Secret.
flavorText: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.

name: Khadgar
text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice as many.
flavorText: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

name: Kidnapper
text: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
flavorText: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

name: Kill Command
text: Deal 3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal 5 damage instead.
flavorText: "Kill!", he commanded.

name: Kill Command
text: Deal 3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal 5 damage instead.
flavorText: "Kill!", he commanded.

name: Kindly Grandmother
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Big Bad Wolf.
flavorText: "Goodness! What… abundant drool you have."

name: King Krush
text: Charge
flavorText: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: King Mosh
text: Battlecry: Destroy all damaged minions.
flavorText: He's a terror at concerts.

name: King Mukla
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
flavorText: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

name: King Togwaggle
text: Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
flavorText: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

name: King's Defender
text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
flavorText: "King's Attacker" is a shield. Funny, huh?

name: Kingsbane
text: Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
flavorText: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

name: Kirin Tor Mage
text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
flavorText: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran. How do you make a Dalaran float? Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
text: Spell Damage +3 Your spells cost (1) more.
flavorText: The math checks out!

name: Knife Juggler
text: After you summon a minion, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers. They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

name: Knife Juggler
text: After you summon a minion, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers. They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

name: Knight of Anointment
text: Battlecry: Draw a Holy spell.
flavorText: "I dub thee... injured."

name: Knight of the Wild
text: Whenever you summon a Beast, reduce the Cost of this card by (1).
flavorText: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

name: Knuckles
text: After this attacks a minion, it also hits the enemy hero.
flavorText: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

name: Kobold Barbarian
text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
flavorText: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

name: Kobold Geomancer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Kobold Hermit
text: Battlecry: Choose a basic Totem. Summon it.
flavorText: To truly understand candles, it takes YEARS of quiet contemplation.

name: Kobold Librarian
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

name: Kobold Monk
text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: There is no candle.

name: Kobold Stickyfinger
text: Battlecry: Steal your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: He no take candle. He take sword.

name: Kodo Mount
text: Give a minion +4/+2 and Rush. When it dies, summon a Kodo.
flavorText: No matter how big they are or how many times you tell them no, they STILL won't stay off the couch.

name: Kolkar Pack Runner
text: After you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
flavorText: Is he running or galloping?

name: Kor'kron Elite
text: Charge
flavorText: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Kor'vas Bloodthorn
text: Charge, Lifesteal After you play a card with Outcast, return this to your hand.
flavorText: Illidan taught her that demon hunters should sacrifice EVERYTHING… but she still brought Lifesteal just in case.

name: Kotori Lightblade
text: After you cast a Holy spell on this, cast it again on another friendly minion.
flavorText: You need healing.

name: Krag'wa, the Frog
text: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to your hand.
flavorText: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

name: Krolusk Barkstripper
text: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

name: Krul the Unshackled
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon all Demons from your hand.
flavorText: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavorText: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.

name: Kun the Forgotten King
text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

name: Kurtrus, Demon-Render
text: Battlecry: Summon two /4 Demons with Rush. (Improved by your hero attacks this game.)
flavorText: "I dedicated my life to vanquishing demons, but I never thought to face the demons in me. Maybe, in time, I can help quell the demons in you." -Kurtrus, to Cariel

name: Lab Partner
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

name: Lady Anacondra
text: Your Nature spells cost (2) less.
flavorText: Do you think she got her name before or after she turned into a snake?

name: Lady Prestor
text: Battlecry: Transform minions in your deck into random Dragons. (They keep their original stats and Cost.)
flavorText: To her credit, the best bodyguard for the king WOULD be a dragon in disguise.

name: Lady Vashj
text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Vashj Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: Personal handmaiden to Queen Azshara turned lieutenant to Illidan Stormrage. Also quite the hair sssstylist.

name: Lake Thresher
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavorText: "There’s a monster in the lake?!" "That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

name: Lakkari Felhound
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discard your two lowest-Cost cards.
flavorText: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

name: Lance Carrier
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack.
flavorText: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies. A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

name: Landscaping
text: Summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavorText: We'll put a happy tree right here... and give him a little friend.

name: Lava Burst
text: Deal 5 damage. Overload: (2)
flavorText: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

name: Lava Shock
text: Deal 2 damage. Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.

name: Lay on Hands
text: Restore 8 Health. Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Lay on Hands
text: Restore 8 Health. Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Lazul's Scheme
text: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by 1 until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavorText: "What's that you're dreaming? You're weak and you're screaming! It must be my scheming..."

name: Leatherclad Hogleader
text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
flavorText: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

name: Leatherworking Kit
text: After three friendly Beasts die, draw a Beast and give it +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
flavorText: Combining taxidermy and tailoring.

name: Leeroy Jenkins
text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
flavorText: At least he has Angry Chicken.

name: Legionnaire
text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: *not related to the Burning Legion

name: Leper Gnome
text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavorText: A diamond, white, this stone the eighth A precious jewel for those of faith A whispered prayer restores the lost But none among them know the cost.

name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
text: Summon two 3/3 Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
flavorText: An emerald stone for Tauren hands Who sought its strength to save their lands Their tribes now lost, their rage released Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. (Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
flavorText: In ancient woods, elves fought the curse The demon’s shadow to disperse But hatred raged and frail souls turned Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
flavorText: To dwarves of stone the demon called With promises of might, enthralled In grasping greed they found their doom Forever bound in mithril tombs.

name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. (Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
flavorText: In ages old, when Ancients broke Azari of the Legion spoke To tempt the mortals: gems of power The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. (Play 2 Elementals to upgrade.)
flavorText: The final stone undid its master Spun into wards by nameless caster Azari wailed a savage roar Now sealed in nether, evermore.

name: Level Up!
text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavorText: Ding! Grats.

name: Libram of Hope
text: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

name: Libram of Justice
text: Equip a 1/4 weapon. Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavorText: Proper justice. Throw the book at him!

name: Licensed Adventurer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, add a Coin to your hand.
flavorText: "Just point me in the vague direction of the things you want smashed, and you got yourself a deal!"

name: Lifedrinker
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

name: Lifeweaver
text: Whenever you restore Health, add a random Druid spell to your hand.
flavorText: Lifeweaving is all well and good until it's time to cut the thread.

name: Light of the Naaru
text: Restore 3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
flavorText: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

name: Light's Justice
flavorText: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Light's Justice
flavorText: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Lightbomb
text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavorText: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Lightbomb
text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavorText: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Lightforged Blessing
text: Twinspell Give a friendly minion Lifesteal.
flavorText: Some might call this a lightforgery.

name: Lightforged Crusader
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
flavorText: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Lightfused Stegodon
text: Battlecry: Adapt your Silver Hand Recruits.
flavorText: “Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.”

name: Lightning Bloom
text: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only. Overload: (2)
flavorText: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Deal 3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavorText: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Lightning Breath
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, also damage its neighbors.
flavorText: Recipe: One dragon, four wool socks, thick shag carpet.

name: Lightning Storm
text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavorText: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

name: Lightshower Elemental
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

name: Lightspawn
text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavorText: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Lightspawn
text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavorText: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Lightsteed
text: Your healing effects also give affected minions +2 Health.
flavorText: All the steed, half the calories.

name: Lightwarden
text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

name: Lightwarden
text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

name: Lightwell
text: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavorText: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

name: Lightwell
text: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavorText: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

name: Lil' Exorcist
text: Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each enemy Deathrattle minion.
flavorText: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

name: Lilypad Lurker
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, transform an enemy minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavorText: Honestly, the frog did nothing wrong.

name: Linecracker
text: Overkill: Double this minion's Attack.
flavorText: "Tell me if you’ve heard this one!"

name: Lion's Frenzy
text: Has Attack equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
flavorText: Only as sharp as your draw.

name: Livewire Lance
text: After your Hero attacks, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.

name: Living Mana
text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 Treants. Recover the mana when they die.
flavorText: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

name: Living Roots
text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
flavorText: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

name: Living Roots

flavorText: You see, it's all about throughput.

name: Multi-Strike

flavorText: “I said you get two attack, not two attacks!”

name: Murgur Murgurgle

flavorText: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

name: Murkwater Scribe
text: Battlecry: The next spell you play costs (1) less.
flavorText: The pen is mightier than the trident.

name: Murloc Raider
flavorText: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

name: Murloc Raider
flavorText: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

name: Murloc Tidecaller
text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Murloc Tidecaller
text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Murloc Tidecaller

name: Murloc Tidehunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
flavorText: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

name: Murloc Tinyfin
flavorText: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.

name: Murloc Tinyfin
flavorText: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.

name: Murloc Warleader
text: Your other Murlocs have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound? Nope! Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

name: Murloc Warleader
text: ALL other murlocs have +2/+1.
flavorText: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound? Nope! Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

name: Murloc Warleader
