name: Murmy
text: Reborn
flavorText: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

name: Murozond the Infinite
text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last turn.
flavorText: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

name: Muster for Battle
text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
flavorText: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

name: Mutate
text: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavorText: You'll get the transformation you want when murlocs fly.

name: Myra's Unstable Element
text: Draw the rest of your deck.
flavorText: What could go wrong?

name: Mysterious Challenger
text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavorText: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

name: N'Zoth's First Mate
text: Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Rusty Hook.
flavorText: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavorText: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

name: Naga Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on spells this game.
flavorText: He might be giant, but he’s still a couple thousand protein shakes away from competing in the Colossal Wrestling Championship.

name: Naga Sea Witch
text: Your cards cost (5).
flavorText: If she had studied harder, she would have been a C+ witch.

name: Naga's Pride
text: Summon two 2/2 Lionfish. If you played a Naga while holding this, give them +1/+1.
flavorText: Lionfish, Naga, and Spears, oh my!

name: Nagrand Slam
text: Summon four 3/5 Clefthoofs that attack random enemies.
flavorText: Come on and slam, and welcome to Nagrand!

name: Nat Pagle
text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavorText: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman! He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

name: Nat Pagle
text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavorText: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman! He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

name: Nat, the Darkfisher
text: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavorText: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

name: Naturalize
text: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavorText: Another one bites the dust.

name: Naturalize
text: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavorText: Another one bites the dust.

name: Naval Mine
text: Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: A Naval Mine? I'd rather it be Naval Yours.

name: Nazmani Bloodweaver
text: After you cast a spell, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Her first stage name, Ketchupweaver, failed to excite the audience.

name: Necrium Blade
text: Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion.
flavorText: Grab death by the handle.

name: Necromechanic
text: Your Deathrattles trigger twice.
flavorText: If at first you don't succeed, die, die again.

name: Necrotic Geist
text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavorText: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

name: Neeru Fireblade
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, open a portal that fills your board with 3/2 Imps each turn.
flavorText: Look at this guy! He’s obviously evil! OBVIOUSLY!!!

name: Neferset Ritualist
text: Battlecry: Restore adjacent minions to full Health.
flavorText: The Neferset are great—they'll always make sure their friends are feline fine.

name: Neferset Thrasher
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

name: Nerub'ar Weblord
text: Minions with Battlecry cost (2) more.
flavorText: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.

name: Nerubian Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavorText: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

name: Nerubian Prophet
text: At the start of your turn, reduce this card's Cost by (1).
flavorText: It’s a self-reducing prophecy.

name: Nerubian Unraveler
text: Spells cost (2) more.
flavorText: He loves a good yarn.

name: Nether Breath
text: Deal 2 damage. If you're holding a Dragon, deal 4 damage with Lifesteal instead.
flavorText: "Whether the Nether is cold, whether the Nether is hot, we'll burn together, whatever the Nether, whether we like it or not."

name: Netherspite Historian
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a Dragon.
flavorText: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!

name: Netherwind Portal
text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a random 4-Cost minion.
flavorText: More aromatic than a regular portal.

name: Never Surrender!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +2 Health.
flavorText: But sometimes concede.

name: Night Howler
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

name: Nightbane Templar
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
flavorText: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.

name: Nightblade
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

name: Nightmare Amalgam
text: This has all minion types.
flavorText: Be all that you can be.

name: Nightscale Matriarch
text: Whenever a friendly minion is healed, summon a 3/3 Whelp.
flavorText: Everywhelp, get in here!

name: Nine Lives
text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Also trigger its Deathrattle.
flavorText: Beware the night of the living pets!

name: Nitroboost Poison
text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Corrupt: And your weapon.
flavorText: Pouring iced milk into your vehicle's fuel tank does NOT provide a Nitro boost, but it does go great with your victory cookies.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavorText: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavorText: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: Nofin Can Stop Us
text: Give your minions +1/+1. Give your Murlocs an extra +1/+1.
flavorText: "I'm having a good time! I don't want to stop at all!"

name: Northshire Cleric
text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavorText: They help the downtrodden and distressed. Also they sell cookies.

name: Northshire Cleric
text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavorText: They help the downtrodden and distressed. Also they sell cookies.

name: Northshire Cleric
text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavorText: They help the downtrodden and distressed. Also they sell cookies.

name: Northwatch Commander
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, draw a minion.
flavorText: It was all going well until some Horde had the cunning idea of attacking from the south.

name: Nourish
text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

name: Nourish
text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

name: Nourish
text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

name: Novice Engineer
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

name: Nozari
text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
flavorText: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

name: Nozdormu
text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
flavorText: Time to write some flavor text.

name: Nozdormu
text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
flavorText: Time to write some flavor text.

name: Nozdormu the Timeless
text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Time is mana!

name: Oasis Ally
text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental.
flavorText: As gentle as a bellyflop.

name: Oasis Snapjaw
flavorText: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

name: Oasis Snapjaw
flavorText: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

name: Oasis Thrasher
text: Frenzy: Deal 3 damage to the enemy Hero.
flavorText: Didn't get tickets for E.T.C.'s show.

name: Obsidian Destroyer
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
flavorText: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!

name: Obsidian Shard
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've played from another class.
flavorText: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh! Dagger!”

name: Obsidiansmith
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a minion or a weapon, give it +1/+1.
flavorText: Was able to produce more effective weapons than his predecessor, Kelpsmith.

name: Octosari
text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
flavorText: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

name: Ogre Brute
text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavorText: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

name: Ogre Magi
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

name: Ogre Warmaul
text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavorText: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

name: Oh My Yogg!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, they instead cast a random one of the same Cost.
flavorText: Many wonders lie within, but they are not mere toys when your mind is their plaything.

name: Old Murk-Eye
text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
flavorText: He's a legend among murlocs. "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

name: Omega Agent
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, summon 2 copies of this minion.
flavorText: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

name: Omega Defender
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +10 Attack.
flavorText: "Surrender. You have 10 mana to comply."

name: Omega Medic
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore 10 Health to your hero.
flavorText: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

name: On the Hunt
text: Deal 1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Mastiff.
flavorText: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

name: Onyx Bishop
text: Battlecry: Summon a friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.

name: Onyxia
text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
flavorText: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor. You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

name: Onyxia the Broodmother
text: At the end of each turn, fill your board with 1/1 Whelps.
flavorText: Throw more dots, throw more dots, more dots, more dots!

name: Onyxian Warder
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavorText: Throwing more whelps at the problem might not help, but they certainly will hurt.

name: Open the Cages
text: Secret: When your turn starts, if you control two minions, summon an Animal Companion.
flavorText: "Coming out of my cage, and I'm dead by turn nine..."

name: Optimistic Ogre
text: 50% chance to attack the correct enemy.
flavorText: "What if this goes wrong?" "But what if this goes right?"

name: Oracle of Elune
text: After you play a minion that costs (2) or less, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: Even the moon goddess needs to back up her databases.

name: Ornery Direhorn
text: Taunt Battlecry: Adapt.
flavorText: "It's an herbivore. How dangerous can it be?" - Famous last words

name: Outrider's Axe
text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
flavorText: "I only have to get 4 Zhevra hooves? How hard could that be?"

name: Overdraft
text: Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
flavorText: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

name: Overflow
text: Restore 5 Health to all characters. Draw 5 cards.
flavorText: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

name: Overgrowth
text: Gain two empty Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Zangarmarsh: it's a fungal out there!

name: Overlord Saurfang
text: Battlecry: Resurrect 2 friendly Frenzy minions. Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Eats more than his fair share of sour candy.

name: Overlord's Whip
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
flavorText: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

name: Overwhelm
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.
flavorText: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone terribly, terribly awry.

name: Pack Kodo
text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast, Secret, or weapon.
flavorText: He looks simple, but there’s a lot to unpack.

name: Package Runner
text: Can only attack if you have at least 8 cards in hand.
flavorText: He could go... all... the... way!

name: Pandaren Importer
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that didn't start in your deck.
flavorText: She carries everything you didn't want and more!

name: Parachute Brigand
text: After you play a Pirate, summon this minion from your hand.
flavorText: She flies standby.

name: Paragon of Light
text: While this minion has 3 or more Attack, it has Taunt and Lifesteal.
flavorText: She’s all fun and games until someone rings that stupid bell.

name: Park Panther
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

name: Parrrley
text: Swap this for a card in your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Time to engage in some unfriendly negotiations.

name: Partner Assignment
text: Add a random 2-Cost and 3-Cost Beast to your hand.
flavorText: In every group assignment, someone does all the legwork.

name: Party Up!
text: Summon five 2/2 Adventurers with random bonus effects.
flavorText: Random? But what if we don't get a tank?

name: Patches the Pirate
text: After you play a Pirate, summon this minion from your deck.
flavorText: What do sailors yell when Patches steals their treasure chest full of laws and other things being transported to parliament for a vote? "The Eyes have it!"

name: Patient Assassin
text: Stealth Poisonous
flavorText: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

name: Peasant
text: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
flavorText: Better pay them, or they'll join the Defias.

name: Pen Flinger
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion. Spellburst: Return this to your hand.
flavorText: The pen is also a more aerodynamic short-range projectile than the sword.

name: Peon
text: Frenzy: Add a random spell from your class to your hand.
flavorText: Joke's on the peon: the job's never done.

name: Perdition's Blade
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
flavorText: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

name: Persistent Peddler
text: Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon a Persistent Peddler from your deck.
flavorText: Loves pyramid schemes and bike rides.

name: Petting Zoo
text: Summon a 3/3 Strider. Repeat for each Secret you control.
flavorText: Welcome to the petting zoo. DO NOT TOUCH THE ANIMALS.

name: Phantom Freebooter
text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
flavorText: There's no such thing as a free boot.

name: Pharaoh Cat
text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your hand.
flavorText: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

name: Phase Stalker
text: After you use your Hero Power, cast a Secret from your deck.
flavorText: It's not just a phase! I don't have to tell you anything! GAWSH!

name: Piercing Shot
text: Deal 6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavorText: Goblins hate wasting money on unnecessary ammunition.

name: Pilfer
text: Add a random card from another class to your hand.
flavorText: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.

name: Pilfered Power
text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal for each friendly minion.
flavorText: The Hozen don't get paid much, but at least they get to keep any excess mana.

name: Piloted Shredder
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavorText: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

name: Pint-Size Potion
text: Give all enemy minions -3 Attack this turn only.
flavorText: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

name: Pint-Sized Summoner
text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
flavorText: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

name: Pint-Sized Summoner
text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
flavorText: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

name: Piranha Launcher
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Piranha.
flavorText: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

name: Piranha Poacher
text: At the end of your turn, add a 1/1 Piranha Swarmer to your hand.
flavorText: This snack certainly isn’t smiling back…

name: Pirate Admiral Hooktusk
text: Battlecry: If you've summoned 8 other Pirates this game, plunder the enemy! ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: You win some, you ransom.

name: Pit Crocolisk
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
flavorText: PIT! Not PET!

name: Pit Fighter
flavorText: What did the pits ever do to you?

name: Pit Lord
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

name: Pit Snake
text: Poisonous
flavorText: It could be worse. It could be a Snake Pit.

name: Plague Scientist
text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
flavorText: The excruciating pain means it's working!

name: Plague of Death
text: Silence and destroy all minions.
flavorText: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

name: Plague of Flames
text: Destroy all your minions. For each one, destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: This is fine.

name: Plague of Murlocs
text: Transform all minions into random Murlocs.
flavorText: This is horrible! And adorable!

name: Plague of Wrath
text: Destroy all damaged minions.
flavorText: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

name: Plagued Protodrake
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 7-Cost minion.
flavorText: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

name: Platebreaker
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's Armor.
flavorText: Worst. Dinner guest. Ever.

name: Plated Beetle
text: Deathrattle: Gain 3 Armor.
flavorText: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

name: Playmaker
text: After you play a Rush minion, summon a copy with 1 Health remaining.
flavorText: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

name: Plot Twist
text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw that many cards.
flavorText: It’s coming from inside the deck!

name: Poison Seeds
text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
flavorText: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.

name: Poisoned Blade
text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
flavorText: How much more poisoned can a blade get? The answer is a lot. A lot more poisoned.

name: Polymorph
text: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.
flavorText: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Polymorph
text: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.
flavorText: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Pompous Thespian
text: Taunt
flavorText: Alas poor Annoy-o-Tron! A fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy!

name: Portal Keeper
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavorText: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

name: Possessed Lackey
text: Deathrattle: Recruit a Demon.
flavorText: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

name: Potion Vendor
text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: Everyone gets two because that’s all she can hold.

name: Potion of Illusion
text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavorText: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

name: Potion of Madness
text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavorText: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

name: Pounce
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

name: Pounce
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

name: Power Infusion
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavorText: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Power Infusion
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavorText: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Power Overwhelming
text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
flavorText: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is. It's CRAZY bad! Maybe worse than that. Just don't do it.

name: Power Overwhelming
text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
flavorText: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is. It's CRAZY bad! Maybe worse than that. Just don't do it.

name: Power Word: Feast
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
flavorText: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

name: Power Word: Fortitude
text: Give a minion +3/+5. Costs (1) less for each spell in your hand.
flavorText: Part of a balanced breakfast.

name: Power Word: Glory
text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding. Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

name: Power Word: Replicate
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
flavorText: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

name: Power Word: Shield
text: Give a minion +2 Health. Draw a card.
flavorText: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Power Word: Shield
text: Give a minion +2 Health. Draw a card.

name: Prophet Velen

name: Razorfen Hunter

name: Rebuke

name: Reckless Flurry

flavorText: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

name: Reckless Rocketeer
text: Charge
flavorText: One Insane Rocketeer. One Rocket full of Explosives. Infinite Fun.

name: Recombobulator
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random minion with the same Cost.
flavorText: For when you didn’t combobulate quite right the first time around.

name: Recruiter

flavorText: Join the Argent Crusade! We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

name: Recycle
text: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

name: Red Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: It has double the Attack. "Go on." And double the Health. "Yes??" And its trigger has twice the effect. "WHAT???" And it costs… Five times more.

name: Redeemed Pariah
text: After you play an Outcast card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "Look at this stick. Look at it!"

name: Redemption
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavorText: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time. It’s a mystery!

name: Redscale Dragontamer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavorText: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: Reflecto Engineer
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions in both players' hands.
flavorText: The whole thing's based on the Rubber-Glue Phenomenon.

name: Refreshing Spring Water
text: Draw 2 cards. Refresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.
flavorText: "Mana" is just another name for "electrolytes."

name: Regenerate
text: Restore 3 Health.
flavorText: Finally a cure for degenerates.

name: Regeneratin' Thug
text: At the start of your turn, restore 2 Health to this minion.
flavorText: Regenerates any injury except heartbreak.

name: Reincarnate
text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
flavorText: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.

name: Reliquary Seeker
text: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
flavorText: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers. The League of Explorers doesn't.

name: Remote-Controlled Golem
text: After this takes damage, shuffle two Golem Parts into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/1 Mech.
flavorText: Someone got a little too excited inventing a can opener.

name: Renew
text: Restore 3 Health. Discover a spell.
flavorText: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

name: Reno Jackson
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fully heal your hero.
flavorText: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.

name: Renounce Darkness
text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
flavorText: SEE YA DARKNESS!

name: Repentance
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
flavorText: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

name: Replicat-o-tron
text: At the end of your turn, transform a neighbor into a copy of this.
flavorText: According to the Boom Labs sales brochure, it "impractically makes itself!"

name: Research Project
text: Each player draws 2 cards.
flavorText: Abstract: Analyzing systemic applications of coldlight data sets vis-a-vis shuffle-related paradigms. Conclusion: Yay, cards!

name: Restless Mummy
text: Rush Reborn
flavorText: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

name: Resurrect
text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"

name: Revenge
text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal 3 damage instead.
flavorText: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.

name: Revenge of the Wild
text: Summon your Beasts that died this turn.
flavorText: My roommates only use Revenge of the Passive Aggressive.

name: Revolve
text: Transform all minions into random ones with the same Cost.
flavorText: "Please don't ride the carousel for thirty minutes after eating. After the carousel eats, I mean."

name: Rhonin
text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.
flavorText: A masterless shamurai.

name: Rigged Faire Game
text: Secret: If you didn't take any damage during your opponent's turn, draw 3 cards.
flavorText: What's faire is fair.

name: Righteous Defense
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1. Give the stats it lost to a minion in your hand.
flavorText: Paladins... Always stealing someone else’s thunder. And stats.

name: Righteous Protector
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavorText: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

name: Rimetongue
text: After you cast a Frost spell, summon a 1/1 Elemental that Freezes.
flavorText: Warriors are red, Frost spells are blue, If you're being hit by a weapon, Rimetongue's got you.

name: Ring Matron
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Imps.

name: Ring of Courage
text: Tradeable Give a minion +1/+1. Repeat for each enemy minion.
flavorText: Now to find the Ring of Wisdom and Ring of Power.

name: Ringmaster's Baton
text: After your hero attacks, give a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: A mech, a dragon, and a pirate walk into an Old God's gaping maw. The mech was too crunchy, the dragon was too hot, but the pirate was just right.

name: Rise to the Occasion
text: Questline: Play 3 different 1-Cost cards. Reward: Equip a 1/4 Light's Justice.
flavorText: Faith is never lost, only repurposed.

name: Risky Skipper
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: Sworn enemy of the Safety Matey.

name: River Crocolisk
flavorText: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

name: River Crocolisk
flavorText: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

name: Robes of Protection
text: Your minions have "Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers."
flavorText: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

name: Rock Rager
text: Taunt
flavorText: Still doesn't understand why he can't beat Paper Rager.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavorText: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavorText: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.

name: Rocket Boots
text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
flavorText: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

name: Rodent Nest
text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Rats.
flavorText: Pig sty? No, this is a rat's nest.

name: Rokara, the Valorous
text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/2 Unstoppable Force.
flavorText: As strong-willed and stubborn as her first day in the Horde, Rokara now wielded a weapon that rivaled even her tenacity.

name: Rolling Fireball
text: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to the left or right.
flavorText: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

name: Rotface
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
flavorText: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

name: Rotten Applebaum
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Key ingredient in Gilnean applesauce.

name: Rumbletusk Shaker

flavorText: Rub a dub dub, three trolls in a tub. And who do you think dey be? Da Shaker, Da Breaker, and Da Undatakah. And all of dem comin' for me.

name: Rummaging Kobold
text: Battlecry: Return one of your destroyed weapons to your hand.
flavorText: "Broken longsword is brand new shortsword." - Kobold Proverb

name: Runaway Blackwing
text: At the end of your turn, deal 9 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: It has been 5 minutes since our last Azeroth Racing League violation.

name: Rune of the Archmage
text: Cast 20 Mana worth of Mage spells at enemies.
flavorText: “It’s not a slot machine! It took YEARS of rigorous studying the intricacies of the universe to unravel the strands of reality. The arcane knowledge alone would enfeeble even the most brilliant of minds. Give it the credence it deserves. It’s a magic slot machine.”

name: Runed Mithril Rod
text: After you draw 4 cards, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1). Lose 1 Durability.
flavorText: "Please, I need these greens to disenchant them." —Every Enchanter Ever

name: Runeforge Haunter
text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
flavorText: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

name: Runic Egg
text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: Oh man! Runic omelettes are the best!

name: Ruststeed Raider
text: Taunt, Rush Battlecry: Gain +4 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Three-time winner (and sole survivor) of the Crashes of Outland motocross!

name: Rustsworn Initiate
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Impcaster with Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: The Rusted Legion's training leaves a little to be desired. He hasn't even had a tetanus shot yet!

name: SI:7 Agent
text: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities. Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

name: SI:7 Agent
text: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities. Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

name: SI:7 Extortion

flavorText: "It's a dangerous world out there. It'd be a shame if your protection insurance were to suddenly run out…"

name: SI:7 Infiltrator
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy Secret.
flavorText: What will she destroy? It’s a secret!

name: SI:7 Operative
text: Rush After this attacks a minion, gain Stealth.
flavorText: What do you mean you're out of ponies?

name: SI:7 Smuggler
text: Battlecry: Summon a random -Cost minion. (Upgraded for each other SI:7 card you have played this game.)
flavorText: After a while, Onyxia's regurgitated rats start to taste pretty good.

name: Sabotage

text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.

name: Swampqueen Hagatha
text: Battlecry: Add a 5/5 Horror to your hand. Teach it two Shaman spells.
flavorText: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

name: Swashburglar
text: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to your hand.
flavorText: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"

name: Sweeping Strikes
text: Give a minion "Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks."
flavorText: Infinitely preferable to mopping strikes.

name: Swift Messenger
text: Rush Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
flavorText: Same turn delivery - guaranteed!

name: Swindle
text: Draw a spell. Combo: And a minion.
flavorText: You know, it's probably just cheaper to find a place that sells the plushie…

name: Swinetusk Shank
text: After you play a Poison, gain +1 Durability.
flavorText: Comes with a rack of ribs!

name: Swipe
text: Deal 4 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to all other enemies.
flavorText: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe! ... or hug.

name: Swipe
text: Deal 4 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to all other enemies.
flavorText: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe! ... or hug.

name: Switcheroo
text: Draw 2 minions. Swap their Health.
flavorText: Would you rather fight one Whale-sized Goldfish, or 100 Goldfish-sized Whales?

name: Sword and Board
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Gain 2 Armor.
flavorText: Stab and Slab. Charge and Targe. Slash and Bash. You get the idea.

name: Sword of Justice
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
flavorText: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

name: Sword of Justice
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
flavorText: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

name: Swordfish
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Pirate, give this weapon and the Pirate +2 Attack.
flavorText: While you were partying, I studied the fish.

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

name: Tainted Zealot
text: Divine Shield Spell Damage +1
flavorText: The love she shares seems to go nowhere. Now she's lost her Light, tosses and turns, she can't sleep at night...

name: Tak Nozwhisker
text: Whenever you shuffle a card into your deck, add a copy to your hand.
flavorText: "One for me and one for future me!"

name: Tame Beast (Rank 1)
text: Summon a 2/2 Beast with Rush. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavorText: "Trust me laddie, I never eat seafood!"

name: Tamsin Roame
text: Whenever you cast a Shadow spell that costs (1) or more, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
flavorText: In life, Tamsin Roame was one of the Alliance's most promising mages; now she is the Horde's most dangerous warlock.

name: Tanaris Hogchopper
text: Battlecry: If your opponent's hand is empty, gain Charge.
flavorText: The Hogchoppers are well-known throughout Kalimdor for being a real, actual group.

name: Tar Creeper
text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavorText: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

name: Tar Lord
text: Taunt Has +4 Attack during your opponent’s turn.
flavorText: Tar Lord, man... legendary monster? Aw, forget it.

name: Target Dummy
text: Taunt
flavorText: The engineering equivalent of a "Kick Me" sticker.

name: Taurajo Brave
text: Frenzy: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: "He's brave, but splinters will make any Tauren cry."

name: Tauren Warrior
text: Taunt. Enrage: +3 Attack
flavorText: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

name: Tavish Stormpike
text: After a friendly Beast attacks, summon a Beast from your deck that costs (1) less.
flavorText: "Hurry up, laddie, we're getting overrun! Serpents everywhere! They may look cute, but do ye see the fury in their eyes?!" —Tavish Stormpike

name: Templar Captain
text: Rush. After this attacks a minion, summon a 5/5 Defender with Taunt.
flavorText: You can combine two of these into a Captain Archon.

name: Temple Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavorText: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Temporus
text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
flavorText: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

name: Tending Tauren
text: Choose One - Give your other minions +1/+1; or Summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavorText: That racial bonus to Herbalism finally paid off.

name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

name: Tentacles for Arms
text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
flavorText: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

name: Teron Gorefiend
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other friendly minions. Deathrattle: Resummon them with +1/+1.
flavorText: "You’re fine, friendly minions! You're fine! Don’t tell Mom!"

name: Terrorscale Stalker
text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavorText: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

name: Tess Greymane
text: Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

name: The Amazing Reno
text: Battlecry: Make all minions disappear. *Poof!*
flavorText: "Reno!" "Please address me by my proper title." " Amazing Reno..."

name: The Beast
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Pip Quickwit for your opponent.
flavorText: He lives in Blackrock Mountain. He eats Gnomes. That's pretty much it.

name: The Beast Within
text: Give a friendly Beast +1/+1, then it attacks a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Undoes years of obedience school training.

name: The Black Knight
text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavorText: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament. We can pretty much mark that a failure.

name: The Boogeymonster
text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Has 20 years of training in classical ballet, but ALLLLLL he ever gets asked to do is boogie.

name: The Boomship
text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
flavorText: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

name: The Curator
text: Taunt Battlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
flavorText: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.

name: The Dark Portal
text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
flavorText: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

name: The Demon Seed
text: Questline: Take 8 damage on your turns. Reward: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Just need some elbow grease to get this working. Oh, and your soul.

name: The Fires of Zin-Azshari
text: Replace your deck with minions that cost (5) or more. They cost (5).
flavorText: One heck of a hot tub.

name: The Fist of Ra-den
text: After you cast a spell, summon a Legendary minion of that Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
flavorText: The mighty Ra-den was known as the Keeper of Storms. Unfortunately, he could not keep his fist.

name: The Garden's Grace
text: Give a minion +5/+5 and Divine Shield. Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on Holy spells this game.
flavorText: The perfect place to hold Conchella.

name: The Last Kaleidosaur
text: Quest: Cast 6 spells on your minions. Reward: Galvadon.
flavorText: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

name: The Lich King
text: Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Death Knight card to your hand.
flavorText: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

name: The Lurker Below
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, repeat on one of its neighbors.
flavorText: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

name: The Mistcaller
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
flavorText: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great. "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

name: The Rat King
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Revive after 5 friendly minions die.
flavorText: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

name: The Skeleton Knight
text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
flavorText: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

name: The Soularium
text: Draw 3 cards. At the end of your turn, discard them.
flavorText: Worst field trip ever.

name: The Storm Bringer
text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
flavorText: Finally, Electra can work from home.

name: The Voraxx
text: After you cast a spell on this minion, summon a 1/1 Plant and cast another copy on it.
flavorText: I am the Voraxx. I speak for the weeds.

name: Thing from Below
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavorText: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

name: Thistle Tea
text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
flavorText: Aren't Thistles prickly? Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

name: Thoughtsteal
text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavorText: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc? Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Thoughtsteal
text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavorText: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc? Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Thrallmar Farseer
text: Windfury
flavorText: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

name: Thrive in the Shadows
text: Discover a spell from your deck.
flavorText: Why would your spells be afraid of the dark? It's easier to nap there.

name: Throw Glaive
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it dies, add a temporary copy of this to your hand.
flavorText: "No, no, I said SHOW me the glaive!"

name: Thunder Lizard
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Adapt.
flavorText: What? THUNDER LIZARD is adapting!

name: Tickatus
text: Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
flavorText: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

name: Ticket Scalper
text: Overkill: Draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Takes ten percent off the top.

name: Tidal Surge
text: Lifesteal Deal 4 damage to a minion.
flavorText: Also good for removing pesky stains.

name: Tidal Wave
text: Lifesteal Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavorText: "Hang Four, mon!"

name: Timber Wolf
text: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack.
flavorText: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Timber Wolf
text: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack.
flavorText: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Time Rip
text: Destroy a minion. Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: "It's time. R.I.P."

name: Tinkertown Technician
text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, gain +1/+1 and add a Spare Part to your hand.
flavorText: Won't you take me to... Tinkertown?

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
text: Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
flavorText: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

name: Tiny Toys
text: Summon four random 5-Cost minions. Make them 2/2.
flavorText: Mom, they're action figures!

name: Tinyfin's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, draw a Murloc.
flavorText: Movin' right along, mrgl mrg mrgl mrg.

name: Tip the Scales
text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
flavorText: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: To My Side!
text: Summon an Animal Companion, or 2 if your deck has no minions.
flavorText: I hunt alone. Well, me and Misha. And Huffer. And Leokk.

name: To the Front!
text: Your minions cost (2) less this turn (but not less than 1).
flavorText: Except healers. You go to the back.

name: Togwaggle's Scheme
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 1 (copy, copies) of it into your deck. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavorText: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavorText: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

name: Tomb Lurker
text: Battlecry: Add a random Deathrattle minion that died this game to your hand.
flavorText: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

name: Tomb Pillager
text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavorText: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.

name: Tomb Warden
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavorText: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

name: Tome of Intellect
text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavorText: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.

name: Toothy Chest
text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
flavorText: Do you want to eat an adventurer? I want to eat an adventurer!

name: Topsy Turvy
text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
flavorText: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

name: Torrent
text: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Costs (3) less if you cast a spell last turn.
flavorText: Weeks of underwater cross-training have really built up her fourarms.

name: Tortollan Pilgrim
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell in your deck and cast it with random targets.
flavorText: A tortollan made it to the desert!

name: Tortollan Shellraiser
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: A hero... In a half-shell.

name: Totem Cruncher
text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy your Totems. Gain +2/+2 for each destroyed.
flavorText: When regular totem hours won't cut it.

name: Totem Goliath
text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems. Overload: (1)
flavorText: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

name: Totemic Might
text: Give your Totems +2 Health.
flavorText: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Totemic Might
text: Give your Totems +2 Health.
flavorText: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Totemic Reflection
text: Give a minion +2/+2. If it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: "Upon reflection, I have decided that your board needs more ME."

name: Totemic Surge
text: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
flavorText: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

name: Touch of the Nathrezim
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it dies, restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

name: Tournament Attendee
text: Taunt
flavorText: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament. He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

name: Tower Sergeant
text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Best helmet in the valley.

name: Toxfin
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc Poisonous.
flavorText: I'm addicted to him, but I know that he's Toxfin.

name: Toxic Reinforcements
text: Sidequest: Use your Hero Power three times. Reward: Summon three 2/1 Leper Gnomes.
flavorText: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

name: Toxicologist
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavorText: Double-majoring in culinary sciences was definitely a mistake.

name: Tracking
text: Discover a card from your deck.
flavorText: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Tracking
text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.
flavorText: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Trade Prince Gallywix
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.
flavorText: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

name: Transfer Student
text: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
flavorText: Oh, the places you'll go! There is so much to fight! There are boards to be explored. There are dreams to take flight.

name: Transmogrifier
text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
flavorText: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

name: Traveling Merchant
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion you control.
flavorText: Northrend's greatest export: funnel cakes.

name: Treachery
text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to your opponent.
flavorText: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

name: Tree of Life
text: Restore all characters to full Health.
flavorText: Healing: It grows on trees!

name: Treespeaker
text: Battlecry: Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients.
flavorText: Honestly, his delivery is a little wooden.

name: Trenchstalker
text: Battlecry: Attack three different random enemies.
flavorText: Cooler heads prevail.

name: Trick Totem
text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
flavorText: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

name: Trogg Gloomeater
text: Taunt Poisonous
flavorText: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

name: Troggzor the Earthinator
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.
flavorText: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

name: Troll Centurion
text: Rush. Honorable Kill: Deal 8 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Centurion? Ha, come back when you’re a millennion.

name: Troublemaker
text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
flavorText: "Prepare for trouble!" "Make it double!"

name: Trueaim Crescent
text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
flavorText: You could have just pointed.

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
flavorText: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
flavorText: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
flavorText: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Tundra Rhino
text: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavorText: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos. Or am I mistaken?

name: Tunnel Trogg
text: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
flavorText: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels. You try your beauty routine without natural light.

name: Tuskarr Fisherman
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: If you bring him 500 fish, he'll give you this sweet Kalu'ak Fishing Pole.

name: Tuskarr Totemic
text: Battlecry: Summon a random basic Totem.
flavorText: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

name: Tuskpiercer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion.
flavorText: It's the Barrens, everything has tusks! The Quilboar have tusks, the boars have tusks, the tusks have tusks.

name: Twilight Acolyte
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
flavorText: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

name: Twilight Deceptor
text: Battlecry: If any hero took damage this turn, draw a Shadow spell.
flavorText: Nobody asks questions if you're carrying a clipboard.

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavorText: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Twilight Elder
text: At the end of your turn, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavorText: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.

name: Twilight Geomancer
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give your C'Thun Taunt (wherever it is).
flavorText: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

name: Twilight Runner
text: Stealth Whenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

name: Twilight Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
flavorText: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.

name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
text: Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
flavorText: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

name: Twin Slice
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Add 'Second Slice' to your hand.
flavorText: The slice so nice, it'll cut you twice.

name: Twin-fin Fin Twin
text: Rush. Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavorText: They call him Murloc Joe, winner of the Big M Memorial Surf Off Competition.

name: Twisted Knowledge
text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
flavorText: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Two-Faced Investor
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a card in your hand by (1). (50% chance to increase.)
flavorText: Should never have opened that joint account...

name: Tyrantus
text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

name: Ultimate Infestation
text: Deal 5 damage. Draw 5 cards. Gain 5 Armor. Summon a 5/5 Ghoul.
flavorText: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

name: Ultrasaur
flavorText: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.

name: Umbral Owl
text: Rush Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
flavorText: It sleeps with one eye open.

name: Unbound Elemental
text: After you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

name: Underbelly Angler
text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavorText: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

name: Underbelly Ooze
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

name: Undercity Valiant
text: Combo: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

name: Underlight Angling Rod
text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavorText: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

name: Undying Disciple
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
flavorText: We get it, you're undead. But jumping out of a grave? That's a bit much.

name: Unexpected Results
text: Summon two random 2-Cost minions (improved by Spell Damage).
flavorText: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

name: Unidentified Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavorText: The terms of service are constantly changing.

name: Unidentified Elixir
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavorText: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

name: Unidentified Maul
text: Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavorText: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

name: Unidentified Shield
text: Gain 5 Armor. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavorText: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Twinspell Summon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
flavorText: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

name: Unleash the Hounds
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavorText: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Unlicensed Apothecary
text: After you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

name: Unpowered Mauler
text: Can only attack if you cast a spell this turn.
flavorText: After a stressful work day it really needs an outlet.

name: Unseal the Vault
text: Quest: Summon 20 minions. Reward: Pharaoh's Warmask.
flavorText: "Huh... That's a nice card back."

name: Unsleeping Soul
text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavorText: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: Unstable Felbolt
text: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion and a random friendly one.
flavorText: Warning! Your minions are seated in the splash zone.

name: Unstable Portal
text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
flavorText: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals. We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

name: Unstable Shadow Blast

name: Unwilling Sacrifice

name: Upgrade!

name: Upgrade!
text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavorText: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Upgradeable Framebot
flavorText: *Awesome arm not included.

name: Ur'zul Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each friendly minion that died this game.

name: Urchin Spines
text: Your spells this turn are Poisonous.
flavorText: I shouldn't have licked that.

name: Usher of Souls

flavorText: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer

flavorText: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

name: Validated Doomsayer

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Vaporize

name: Varden Dawngrasp
text: Battlecry: Freeze all enemy minions. If any are already Frozen, deal 4 damage to them instead.
flavorText: Varden Dawngrasp could wield fire, summon hailstorms, and morph a night elf into a sheep with a snap of their fingers. Knowing how malleable reality could be, certain labels felt downright trivial.

name: Varian, King of Stormwind

flavorText: Man, this guy is so cool. Sure hope nothing happens to him.

name: Veiled Worshipper
text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, draw 3 cards.

name: Vendetta
text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.

name: Venomancer
text: Poisonous
flavorText: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

name: Venomous Scorpid
text: Poisonous Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: Despite what Guff says, he is NOT a "nice little guy."

name: Venomstrike Trap
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3 Poisonous Cobra.
flavorText: Snakes on a frozen plain.

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
text: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavorText: No Job is too big. No fee is too big.

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
text: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavorText: No Job is too big. No fee is too big.

name: Verdant Longneck
text: Battlecry: Adapt.

name: Vessina

name: Vex Crow

name: Vicious Fledgling

name: Vicious Scraphound

name: Vicious Slitherspear

name: Vilebrood Skitterer

name: Vilefiend Trainer

name: Vilespine Slayer

name: Vinecleaver

name: Violet Spellwing

flavorText: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavorText: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig. And then you get your name on the board.

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavorText: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig. And then you get your name on the board.

name: Violet Wurm

flavorText: It's wurms all the way down.

name: Vitality Surge

flavorText: If your vitality lasts longer than four hours, consult a Priest.

name: Vitality Totem
text: At the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

name: Vivid Nightmare

name: Void Analyst

name: Void Ripper

name: Void Terror

flavorText: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Void Terror
text: Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
flavorText: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Voidgill

name: Voidtouched Attendant

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt
flavorText: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Vol'jin

name: Volcanic Drake
text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.

name: Volcanic Potion

name: Volcanomancy

name: Voodoo Doctor

name: Voracious Reader

name: Vulpera Toxinblade

name: WANTED!

name: War Golem
flavorText: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them. Instinct, maybe? A desire to blend in?

name: Warbot

name: Warglaives of Azzinoth

name: Warhorse Trainer
text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.

name: Warhorse Trainer
text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.

text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.

name: Wisp

name: Wrath

text: Choose One - Deal 3 damage to a minion; or 1 damage and draw a card.
flavorText: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

name: Wrathscale Naga

flavorText: If throwing glaives is what you crave; summon tokens and make 'em broken.

name: Wrathscale Naga

flavorText: If throwing glaives is what you crave; summon tokens and make 'em broken.

name: Wretched Tiller

name: Wriggling Horror

name: Yoink!

name: Young Priestess

name: Young Priestess

name: Ysera

name: Ysiel Windsinger
text: Your spells cost (1).
flavorText: Reach down into your lungs. The wind that resides there is your greatest treasure. It provides the gift of song, which is free. *But not less than (1)

name: Zai, the Incredible
text: Battlecry: Copy the left- and right-most cards in your hand.
flavorText: Following this act will be her younger brother, Frank the Mediocre.

name: Zap!
text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavorText: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

name: Zayle, Shadow Cloak
text: You start the game with one of Zayle's EVIL Decks!
flavorText: E.V.I.L. is the new black.
